justification: The data clump with key 0 is present in two test classes, indicating a common setup for test cases which suggests that these fields are related and possibly represent a common concept in the domain of the application. Refactoring this data clump into a single object would not only improve code readability and maintainability but also make it easier to manage the test setup and any changes to the underlying model in the future. Moreover, the metrics show a high occurrence (90) and size (4), which means that this clump has a significant impact on the codebase.
